attributes.background: The GCSE are getting harder by the year to the point that most of the UK population will fail their exams. The government has to stop making the exams for students because they have as much pressure and anxiety as they already have.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could also sign the petition below, which asks the Government to change GCSE examinations back to their previous form:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/181962
